title: Arwen, Elven Rider (3U7)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Elf
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ranger. Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.
Lore:	”'If I can cross the river, the power of my people will protect him.'”
Rarity:	U
